http:request.http:headers: #[output application/java --- { "client_secret" : p('mongo-db-sapi.security.client-secret'), "client_id" : p('mongo-db-sapi.security.client-id'), "name": vars.headers.name, "X-CORRELATION-ID": vars.headers."X-CORRELATION-ID", "source": vars.headers.source, "systemId": vars.headers.systemId }]
http:request.http:query-params:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/java --- { (OrderNumber: payload.filtros.OrderNumber) if (payload.filtros.OrderNumber? and payload.filtros.OrderNumber != ""), (CustomerIdType: vars.parameters.CUSTOMER_ID_TYPE) if (vars.parameters.CUSTOMER_ID_TYPE? and vars.parameters.CUSTOMER_ID_TYPE != ""), (CustomerId: vars.parameters.CUSTOMER_ID) if (vars.parameters.CUSTOMER_ID? and vars.parameters.CUSTOMER_ID != "")
}]
